description.translate: Rise up, grow up, raise up, more and more and relentlessly to reach the ultimate goal.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§6Perpétuelle apogée\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Lèves-toi, grandis, élèves-toi, plus encore\"}","{\"text\":\"§7et sans relâche pour atteindre l'ultime finalité.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Rise up, grow up, raise up, more and more\"}","{\"text\":\"§7and relentlessly to reach the ultimate goal.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7HAS§a4\"}"]}}
